briefTitle: Pyrotinib Combined With Trastuzumab And Chemotherapy in HER2-positive MBC
officialTitle: Pyrotinib Combined With Trastuzumab and Chemotherapy in HER2-positive Metastatic Breast Cancer Patients- a Multicenter Retrospective Study
conditions: HER2-positive Breast Cancer, Metastatic Breast Cancer
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* woman, age \> 18 years old
* Diagnosed with HER2 +Metastatic Breast Cancer
* Pyrotinib Combined With Trastuzumab And Chemotherapy for at least one cycle, starting from 2020.11.01-2021.10.31
* Available medical history

Exclusion Criteria:

* Incomplete medical history
